title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You may need to do research on your own instead of just accepting what a friend tells you now. Your comrade might mean well with their opinion, but its possible their facts are off. People allow their emotions to color how they see the world while hazy Neptune blurs the usually discerning Virgo Moon. Also, be mindful that some kind of bias doesnt afflict you today. Stay curious about the details. Attorney Gerry Spence wrote, I would rather have a mind opened by wonder than one closed by belief. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
